== Wandoor (627481) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Wandoor is a village in the [[Nilambur]] taluka of [[Malappuram]] district with an area of 4732 hectares and harbouring 10663 households with total population of 50973 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Manjeri]] is at a distance of 20 km. Male population is 24516 and female population is 26457. Scheduled Caste Population is 6940 and Scheduled Tribes population is 288. Census Location Code of the village is 627481<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 41077 (80.59%)
* Literate male population: 20176 (82.3%)
* Literate female population: 20901 (79.0%)
